The tweet was published by Metropol TV K: a business-focused television station launched in Kenya this year. The tweet received significant engagement, with over 500 retweets and 800 likes.
The same claim was also published on Met: s Facebook page, which has over 4000 followers.
Starbucks: press officer, Georgia Mission, confirmed via email that the claim was inaccurate and that Starbucks currently has no plans to open a branch in Nairobi.
